name: UFO Evac.
description:
JamDNA4 Submission

Worked on by:
SassyWolfie
DavidC

Criteria:
Nighttime - The game occurs during the night (visible during the end escape scene)

Eerie - UFO escaping from a military base

Ambient Piano - Base background and elevator music is piano

Vibrant - The UFO controlled by the player constantly oscillates

Unique Assets Disclaimer:

All assets used in this game have been created by the SassyWolfie or DavidC with the exception of:

Font - Armalite Rifle created by Vic Fieger who released this font for free private and commercial use.
